Package br.ufrn.imd.control

Class PlayerController

java.lang.Object
br.ufrn.imd.control.WindowController
br.ufrn.imd.control.PlayerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class PlayerController extends br.ufrn.imd.control.WindowController implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The PlayerController class manages the main functionality of the music player application. It extends WindowController and implements Initializable for JavaFX initialization. This controller handles various actions related to playlists, music, and directories, as well as interactions with the FileManagementService for data management. The class includes methods for feeding data to tables, adding new music, creating playlists, adding directories, and handling player controls. Additionally, the class uses JavaFX components such as TableView, Menu, and Button for user interaction.
Since:
3/12/2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
Davi Matias, Jose Maia

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL arg0, ResourceBundle arg1)
      Initializes the PlayerController by setting up the FileManagementService and JavaFX components. It also customizes the user interface based on the user's type (e.g., vipUser).
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      arg0 - URL location not used in this implementation.
      arg1 - ResourceBundle not used in this implementation.
